addon.description: Teleboy frontend; supporting streaming of Live TV & Recordings, EPG, Timers
addon.disclaimer: The authors are in no way responsible for failed recordings, incorrect timers, wasted hours, or any other undesirable effects..
addon.name: Teleboy PVR Client
